title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma…) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async generators, Pydantic models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama as LLM & embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and model switcher.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s sidebar.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama; wraps REST endpoints with idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-cpp-rust
summary: Rust crate exposing safe bindings to Ollama’s low-level C++ inference core.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset—use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with RxJS streams.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama + llama-index to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks (CPU/GPU) with CUDA/ROCm variants.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express middleware that proxies OpenAI routes to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Pure-Rust async client using reqwest; supports chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for talking to Ollama; handy for mobile/desktop apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama targeting .NET 6+ with async enumerable streams.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of community Modelfiles for CodeLlama, Vicuna, Zephyr, etc.
